mapper.update:
update INV_STOCK_TRX_DETAIL
SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOCATOR_ID = #{locatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPER_TYPE = #{operType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_REASON_CODE = #{operReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRY_DATE = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PACKING_TYPE = #{packingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_OF_CARTON = #{unitOfCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUMBER_OF_CARTON = #{numberOfCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUMBER_OF_IND_CARTON = #{numberOfIndCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMAINING_IND_AFT_CAR = #{remainingIndAftCar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT_COST = #{unitCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where TRX_DETAIL_ID = #{trxDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update INV_STOCK_TRX_DETAIL set TRX_ID = #{trxId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOCATOR_ID = #{locatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER_TYPE = #{operType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_REASON_CODE = #{operReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRY_DATE = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PACKING_TYPE = #{packingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_OF_CARTON = #{unitOfCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER_OF_CARTON = #{numberOfCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER_OF_IND_CARTON = #{numberOfIndCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMAINING_IND_AFT_CAR = #{remainingIndAftCar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNIT_COST = #{unitCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TRX_DETAIL_ID = #{trxDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select std.* , iib.item_number as ITEM_NUMBER, coalesce(iibct.item_name, iib.item_name) as ITEM_NAME, uom.UOM_CODE as UOM_CODE, coalesce(uomct.NAME, uom.NAME) as UOM_NAME, (select coalesce(uomct.NAME, uom.NAME) from INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_B uom LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_TL uomct on (uom.UOM_CODE = uomct.UOM_CODE AND uomct.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where uom.UOM_CODE = std.PACKING_TYPE ) as TO_UOM_NAME from INV_STOCK_TRX_DETAIL std, INV_ITEM_B iib LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_ITEM_TL iibct on (iib.ITEM_ID = iibct.ITEM_ID AND iibct.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_B uom LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_TL uomct on (uom.UOM_CODE = uomct.UOM_CODE AND uomct.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where std.trx_id = #{trxId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and std.organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and std.item_id = iib.item_id and iib.uom_code = uom.uom_code order by std.rowid asc

SELECT iib.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID, iib.item_number AS ITEM_NUMBER, COALESCE (iibct.item_name,iib.item_name) AS ITEM_NAME, osl.quantity as quantity, osl.UNIT_ORIG_PRICE as unitPrice, uom.UOM_CODE AS UOM_CODE, uom.UOM_CODE AS PACKING_TYPE, coalesce(uomct.NAME, uom.NAME) as UOM_NAME, coalesce(uomct.NAME, uom.NAME) as TO_UOM_NAME FROM OM_SALES_LINE osl, OM_SALES_ORDER oso, TF_PAY_REFUND_REQUEST prr, INV_ITEM_B iib LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_ITEM_TL iibct ON (iib.ITEM_ID = iibct.ITEM_ID AND iibct.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_B uom LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_TL uomct ON (uom.UOM_CODE = uomct.UOM_CODE AND uomct.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHERE PRR.OUT_TRADE_NO = OSO.ORDER_NUMBER AND OSO.HEADER_ID = OSL.HEADER_ID AND OSL.ITEM_ID = iib.ITEM_ID AND iib.uom_code = uom.uom_code AND PRR.OUT_REFUND_NO = #{outRefundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
